channel.title: Creating a Jad and making it drop certain things?
channel.description: What ild like to know is, How to make Jad, And make it so it only drops certain items. I don't want it to be that easy to beat either, so maybe increase the hp of it? Help much appreciated, thanks.

item.title: Creating a Jad and making it drop certain things?
item.dc:creator: @I_Uk_0wn4g3_I I Uk 0wn4g3 I
item.description:
@I_Uk_0wn4g3_I wrote:

IVE FOUND A WAY.

go into NpcHandler and find this

public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)

then add this were you see others like this one

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == NPC ID) { ItemHandler.addItem(THIS IS ITEM ID, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, AMOUNT YOU WANT, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

========================================================================================================

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1) { ItemHandler.addItem(995, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1000, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

This one makes it drop 1000 Coins Money id is 995 and the npc droping this is 1.

Read full topic
item.source: Creating a Jad and making it drop certain things?

item.title: Creating a Jad and making it drop certain things?
item.dc:creator: @Zurghammer Zurghammer
item.description:
@Zurghammer wrote:

I know how to do that.

Open up npcdrops.cfg
add this to there:

npcdrop = 2745 1 4151 1

4151:the item id what you want at he drops,now it’s whip[because whip’s id is 4151]
and next of 4151 is 1,it means how many whips it drop
like this:
npcdrop = 2025 1 4151 10

now it drops 10 whips

—How to make Jad–

Go to autospawn.cfg and scroll down.

add this to there:

spawn = 2745 [CoordY] [coordX] 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Jad

delete [ marks and ] marks when you add coords

I hope at that works.

Zurghammer

Read full topic
